sql.where: 1=1 AND product_detail.pdt_id = #{pdtId} AND product_detail.pdt_borrower_cert_no = #{pdtBorrower_cert_no} AND product_detail.pdt_borrower_cert_type = #{pdtBorrower_cert_type} AND product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_code = #{pdtBorrower_bank_code} AND product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_account = #{pdtBorrower_bank_account} AND product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_account_owner_name = #{pdtBorrower_bank_account_owner_name} AND product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_telephone = #{pdtBorrower_bank_telephone} AND product_detail.pdt_borrower_card_type = #{pdtBorrower_card_type} AND product_detail.pdt_borrower_card_attribute = #{pdtBorrower_card_attribute} AND product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_province = #{pdtBorrower_bank_province} AND product_detail.pdt_borrower_city = #{pdtBorrower_city} AND product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_branch = #{pdtBorrower_bank_branch} AND product_detail.pdt_instruction = #{pdtInstruction} AND product_detail.pdt_yield_instruction = #{pdtYield_instruction} AND product_detail.pdt_risk_instruction = #{pdtRisk_instruction} AND product_detail.pdt_need_risk_evaluation = #{pdtNeed_risk_evaluation} AND product_detail.pdt_risk_level = #{pdtRisk_level} AND product_detail.pdt_require_min_age = #{pdtRequire_min_age} AND product_detail.pdt_require_max_age = #{pdtRequire_max_age} AND product_detail.pdt_hesitation_time = #{pdtHesitation_time} AND product_detail.pdt_remark = #{pdtRemark} AND product_detail.pdt_operator = #{pdtOperator} AND product_detail.pdt_operator_remark = #{pdtOperator_remark}

1=1 AND pdt_id = #{pdtId} AND pdt_borrower_cert_no = #{pdtBorrower_cert_no} AND pdt_borrower_cert_type = #{pdtBorrower_cert_type} AND pdt_borrower_bank_code = #{pdtBorrower_bank_code} AND pdt_borrower_bank_account = #{pdtBorrower_bank_account} AND pdt_borrower_bank_account_owner_name = #{pdtBorrower_bank_account_owner_name} AND pdt_borrower_bank_telephone = #{pdtBorrower_bank_telephone} AND pdt_borrower_card_type = #{pdtBorrower_card_type} AND pdt_borrower_card_attribute = #{pdtBorrower_card_attribute} AND pdt_borrower_bank_province = #{pdtBorrower_bank_province} AND pdt_borrower_city = #{pdtBorrower_city} AND pdt_borrower_bank_branch = #{pdtBorrower_bank_branch} AND pdt_instruction = #{pdtInstruction} AND pdt_yield_instruction = #{pdtYield_instruction} AND pdt_risk_instruction = #{pdtRisk_instruction} AND pdt_need_risk_evaluation = #{pdtNeed_risk_evaluation} AND pdt_risk_level = #{pdtRisk_level} AND pdt_require_min_age = #{pdtRequire_min_age} AND pdt_require_max_age = #{pdtRequire_max_age} AND pdt_hesitation_time = #{pdtHesitation_time} AND pdt_remark = #{pdtRemark} AND pdt_operator = #{pdtOperator} AND pdt_operator_remark = #{pdtOperator_remark}

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM dr_product_detail AS product_detail

SELECT product_detail.pdt_id as pdtId, product_detail.pdt_borrower_cert_no as pdtBorrower_cert_no, product_detail.pdt_borrower_cert_type as pdtBorrower_cert_type, product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_code as pdtBorrower_bank_code, product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_account as pdtBorrower_bank_account, product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_account_owner_name as pdtBorrower_bank_account_owner_name, product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_telephone as pdtBorrower_bank_telephone, product_detail.pdt_borrower_card_type as pdtBorrower_card_type, product_detail.pdt_borrower_card_attribute as pdtBorrower_card_attribute, product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_province as pdtBorrower_bank_province, product_detail.pdt_borrower_city as pdtBorrower_city, product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_branch as pdtBorrower_bank_branch, product_detail.pdt_instruction as pdtInstruction, product_detail.pdt_yield_instruction as pdtYield_instruction, product_detail.pdt_risk_instruction as pdtRisk_instruction, product_detail.pdt_need_risk_evaluation as pdtNeed_risk_evaluation, product_detail.pdt_risk_level as pdtRisk_level, product_detail.pdt_require_min_age as pdtRequire_min_age, product_detail.pdt_require_max_age as pdtRequire_max_age, product_detail.pdt_hesitation_time as pdtHesitation_time, product_detail.pdt_remark as pdtRemark, product_detail.pdt_operator as pdtOperator, product_detail.pdt_operator_remark as pdtOperator_remark FROM dr_product_detail AS product_detail WHERE pdt_id = #{pdtId}

SELECT product_detail.pdt_id as pdtId, product_detail.pdt_borrower_cert_no as pdtBorrower_cert_no, product_detail.pdt_borrower_cert_type as pdtBorrower_cert_type, product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_code as pdtBorrower_bank_code, product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_account as pdtBorrower_bank_account, product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_account_owner_name as pdtBorrower_bank_account_owner_name, product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_telephone as pdtBorrower_bank_telephone, product_detail.pdt_borrower_card_type as pdtBorrower_card_type, product_detail.pdt_borrower_card_attribute as pdtBorrower_card_attribute, product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_province as pdtBorrower_bank_province, product_detail.pdt_borrower_city as pdtBorrower_city, product_detail.pdt_borrower_bank_branch as pdtBorrower_bank_branch, product_detail.pdt_instruction as pdtInstruction, product_detail.pdt_yield_instruction as pdtYield_instruction, product_detail.pdt_risk_instruction as pdtRisk_instruction, product_detail.pdt_need_risk_evaluation as pdtNeed_risk_evaluation, product_detail.pdt_risk_level as pdtRisk_level, product_detail.pdt_require_min_age as pdtRequire_min_age, product_detail.pdt_require_max_age as pdtRequire_max_age, product_detail.pdt_hesitation_time as pdtHesitation_time, product_detail.pdt_remark as pdtRemark, product_detail.pdt_operator as pdtOperator, product_detail.pdt_operator_remark as pdtOperator_remark FROM dr_product_detail AS product_detail
${orderby}
